overview: The NMBDR is a scenic ride across the state of New Mexico, beginning in Dell City, Texas and finishing in Antonito, Colorado. The route has been created specifically for dual-sport and adventure motorcyclists who are interested in exploring New Mexico’s remote backcountry. This 1,200-mile south-to-north route utilizes mainly dirt roads and leads riders through New Mexico’s scenic and challenging terrain including high-elevation forests & mountains, deserts and canyons, Riders on the NMBDR will experience the unique culture and history of New Mexico’s rural towns, native reservations, historic locations & more.  The NMBDR documentary provides an in-depth look into the creation and first expedition of the NMBDR. Follow a group of riders on adventure and dual-sport motorcycles including BMW and KTM as they tackle the most diverse BDR yet.
title: New Mexico BDR
